qa_reviewer.label: QA Reviewer
qa_reviewer.description: Validates acceptance criteria. Uses Electron or Puppeteer based on project type.

qa_fixer.label: QA Fixer
qa_fixer.description: Fixes QA-reported issues. Uses Electron or Puppeteer based on project type.

batch_analysis.label: Batch Analysis
batch_analysis.description: Batch processing of issues or items

context7.name: Context7
context7.description: Documentation lookup for libraries and frameworks via @upstash/context7-mcp

graphiti-memory.name: Graphiti Memory
graphiti-memory.description: Knowledge graph for cross-session context. Requires GRAPHITI_MCP_URL env var.

auto-claude.name: Auto-Claude Tools
auto-claude.description: Build progress tracking, session context, discoveries & gotchas recording

linear.name: Linear
linear.description: Project management via Linear API. Requires LINEAR_API_KEY env var.

electron.name: Electron
electron.description: Desktop app automation via Chrome DevTools Protocol. Requires ELECTRON_MCP_ENABLED=true.

puppeteer.name: Puppeteer
puppeteer.description: Web browser automation for non-Electron web frontends.
